name: Globestruction
description:
Disaster strikes! Aliens have destroyed the earth, and it is up to you to take revenge on the aliens. Be quick though, you only have 3 minutes before the mothership launches a deadly attack! Face against many alien infected ships in this increasingly difficult bullet hell shmup. Kill enemies at point blank to add to your multiplier to get an even higher score! Use the blackhole bomb to absorb enemy bullets! 

Z to shoot, X for bomb, Left Shift for slower movement.

Z for select. X for exiting settings.

Made with the power of Jesus and Fawdot.
